javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

doEndTag

public int doEndTag()
             throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

Configure the current HtmlColumn.

Note that when using an AJAX source, since there is only one iteration, it just adds a header column to the last header HtmlRow added. When using a DOM source, first a header HtmlColumn is added at first iteration and a HtmlColumn is added for each iteration.

Specified by:
doEndTag in interface javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
Overrides:
doEndTag in class javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
